name: CIRCUS - Fun for all the family
name_original: CIRCUS - Fun for all the family
description:
"Circus - Fun for all the family" is our proyect made for the Rage Jam. We tried to create a game that you can enjoy and get tons of fu... Okay, nope, you gonna get a big pain playing this... But that is the spirit of the Rage Jam so... I think we did it well. :P

Follow the instructions which are on the top of the screen. Except you want to have a even harder life... 

Programming: Martín (B Lior), Finn (Cryttexx)
Game Design: Finn (Cryttexx), Martín (B Lior)
Music & Sound: Gareth (Alola Falls)
Art: Dmitriy Dryzhak, Wolfgang Wozniak, GameTextures.com

Special Thanks to Dmitriy Dryzhak who provided us high quality model packages for free!
All rights reserved to their creators.
